bioconda.name: bioconductor-bionet
bioconda.summary: Routines for the functional analysis of biological networks

biotools.summary: This package provides functions for the integrated analysis of protein-protein interaction networks and the detection of functional modules. Different datasets can be integrated into the network by assigning p-values of statistical tests to the nodes of the network. By fitting a beta-uniform mixture model and calculating scores from these p-values, overall scores of network regions can be calculated and an integer linear programming algorithm identifies the maximum scoring subnetwork.

bioschemas.name: BioNet
bioschemas.summary: This package provides functions for the integrated analysis of protein-protein interaction networks and the detection of functional modules. Different datasets can be integrated into the network by assigning p-values of statistical tests to the nodes of the network. By fitting a beta-uniform mixture model and calculating scores from these p-values, overall scores of network regions can be calculated and an integer linear programming algorithm identifies the maximum scoring subnetwork.
